details.p1: [CY] Account owners receive essential emails with information about the authorised agent account.
details.p2: [CY] They must make sure the authorised agent complies with its legal responsibilities. This includes telling us about any changes to the agent's information within 14 days.
details.p3_end: [CY] for more information about the legal responsibilities.

p1: [CY] Authorised agents must have at least one account owner.
page_header: [CY] You need to add an account owner
why_authorised_agents_must: [CY] Why authorised agents must have an account owner
you_need_to_add: [CY] You need to add an account owner to
